refnamediv.refpurpose: Creating a PL wrapper for remote procedure execution

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is to create a PL stored procedure to execute a Remote Stored Procedures. It returns results as a SQL result set as well as an array(vector) depending of the 'make_resultset' flag.

refsect2.title: local_name
refsect2.para: name of the PL wrapper to be created locally

refsect2.title: metadata
refsect2.para: A vector of vectors containing a parameters information each of vectors need to have following structure:

simplelist.member: name of parameter - the name of parameter
data type - SQL datatype of parameter as string (for example 'VARCHAR', 'INT' etc.)
SOAP type - a XSD/custom datatype for SOAP/WSDL actions (if not needed, must be empty string ie. '')

refsect2.title: status_code
refsect2.para: returns SQL status code of the PL wrapper generation

refsect2.title: error_message
refsect2.para: returns the error message if status code is different than 00000

refsect2.title: make_resultset
refsect2.para: A flag 0/1 default 0. If is true (1) the wrapper will be generated to return result set. Otherwise will be generated to return an array.

refsect2.title: description
refsect2.para: The text of a comment to added to the wrapper. It then will be shown as a method description if the PL wrapper is published as a SOAP method.
